# sux-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                  | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | Checked state of the switch  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disabled state of the switch | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | Label for the switch         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | Name of the switch           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value of the switch          | `string`  | `''`        |


## Events

| Event       | Description                                           | Type               |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `suxblur`   | Fires when the element loses focus                    | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `suxchange` | Fires when the value of the input changes             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `suxinput`  | Fires when an alteration to the input's value is made | `CustomEvent<any>` |
